name: Apotheosis Rite
effect: Divine Relic Banish Apotheosis Rite: Your champion becomes an Ascendant in addition to its other types. Draw a card.
flavor: "Only one will rise above."

name: Blastshot Pump
effect: (Gun — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.) Class BonusIf combat damage would be dealt to a unit by an attack using Blastshot Pump, that damage is dealt to that unit and an additional unit you don't control instead.
effect_raw:
(Gun — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.)
[Class Bonus] If combat damage would be dealt to a unit by an attack using Blastshot Pump, that damage is dealt to that unit and an additional unit you don't control instead.

rule.description: Blastshot Pump's replacement effect causes the attacker to deal combat damage to an additional unit. Because this damage is also considered combat damage, it can trigger On Hit effects accordingly.
The unit that is receiving damage from Blastshop Pump's replacement effect can't retaliate because damage would already have been dealt by starting the resolution of the damage step.
The attacking player that controls Blastshot Pump will choose the additional unit for the replacement effect, if applicable.
If damage is reduced before the replacement effect happens, the additional unit will take the reduced damage instead of the full damage amount.

name: Bulwark Sword
effect: Class BonusBulwark Sword gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 2.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Bulwark Sword gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 2.

name: Charged Manaplate
effect: Class BonusBanish Charged Manaplate: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has taken 4 or more damage this turn. (Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Banish Charged Manaplate: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has taken 4 or more damage this turn. (Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Cleric Robes
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion’s class matches this card’s class.) 1, : Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion’s class matches this card’s class.)
(1), [Rest]: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn.

name: Crest of the Alliance
effect: Whenever a fostered ally you control dies, you may banish Crest of the Alliance. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever a fostered ally you control dies, you may banish Crest of the Alliance. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: The precarious truce across nations brokered in the face of an unstoppable force gave rise to the Alliance—humanity's final defense.

name: Flash Grenade
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Banish Flash Grenade: Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to a distant unit you control, prevent 3 of that damage.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Banish Flash Grenade: Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to a distant unit you control, prevent 3 of that damage.

name: Ingredient Pouch
effect: 1, : Gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] (1), REST: gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)
flavor: An herbalist's joy and an alchemist's treasure. Always surprising how much can actually fit inside.

name: Life Essence Amulet
effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death's door."
— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa

editions.flavor:
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn

name: Necklace of Foresight
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to materialize. Banish Necklace of Foresight: Glimpse 4. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.
Banish Necklace of Foresight: Glimpse 4. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)

name: Plated Bullet
effect: Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.) : Load Plated Bullet into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)
effect_raw:
Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.)
REST: Load Plated Bullet into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)

rule.description: While loaded into an object, if that object leaves the field, this bullet would be sent to the graveyard (or banishment if it's a regalia).

name: Powercharged Shield
effect: Banish Powercharged Shield: Target unit with taunt gains vigor until end of turn. (Units with vigor wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)
effect_raw: Banish Powercharged Shield: Target unit with taunt gains vigor until end of turn. (Units with vigor wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)
flavor: Caution: excessive alchemical kinetic conversion may cause myo-paralysis and rapid internal disintegration.

name: Prototype Pistol
effect: (Gun — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.) Class BonusOn Enter: Prototype Pistol gets +1 until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
(Gun — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.)
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Prototype Pistol gets +1 power until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Prototype Staff
effect: Class BonusMemory 4+ Your champion gets +1 level. (Apply this effect only there are four or more cards in your memory.) Level 4+: You may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card into your memory.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] [Memory 4+] Your champion gets +1 level. (Apply this effect only there are four or more cards in your memory.)
[Level 4+] REST: You may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card into your memory.

name: Quickdraw Piercer
effect: (Gun — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.) Class BonusOn Banish: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
(Gun — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.)
[Class Bonus] On Banish: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Scale of Souls
effect: Class BonusBalance — At the beginning of your recollection phase, if the amount of cards in your hand and memory are equal, recover 2. 2, : Return a card from your memory to your hand.
effect_raw:
(Class Bonus) Balance — At the beginning of your recollection phase, if the amount of cards in your hand and memory are equal, recover 2.
2, REST: Return a card from your memory to your hand.

rule.description: If the Balance condition is not met at the beginning of the controller's recollection phase, Scale of Souls won't trigger at all. This means there is no chance to fix the hand/memory to achieve Balance during the recollection phase.
Scale of Soul's Balance condition is also checked during the resolution of its triggered effect as well.

name: Synth Disrupter
effect: Banish Synth Disrupter: Until end of turn, Automaton allies enter the field rested.
effect_raw: Banish Synth Disrupter: Until end of turn, Automaton allies enter the field rested.
flavor: Repurposed in haste to jam and scramble electrical signals characteristic to automatons.

name: Tasershot
effect: Renewable : Load Tasershot into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. Class BonusOn Champion Hit: Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever the hit champion levels up, deal 4 unpreventable damage to them.
effect_raw:
Renewable
REST: Load Tasershot into target unloaded Gun weapon you control.
[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever the hit champion levels up, deal 4 unpreventable damage to them.

rule.description: While loaded into an object, if that object leaves the field, this bullet would be sent to the graveyard (or banishment if it's a regalia).

name: Worn Gearblade
effect: Class Bonus, Remove a durability counter from Worn Gearblade: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn. Whenever an Automaton ally you control dies, put a durability counter on Worn Gearblade.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Rest, Remove a durability counter from Worn Gearblade: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.
Whenever an Automaton ally you control dies, put a durability counter on Worn Gearblade.

name: Penetrator Round
effect: Renewable : Load Penetrator Round into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. Class BonusLevel 2+On Attack: This attack gains "Combat damage dealt by this attack is unpreventable."
effect_raw:
Renewable
REST: Load Penetrator Round into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. 
[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] On Attack: This attack gains "Combat damage dealt by this attack is unpreventable."

rule.description: While loaded into an object, if that object leaves the field, this bullet would be sent to the graveyard (or banishment if it's a regalia).

name: Deployment Beacon
effect: On Enter: Summon an Automaton Drone token. Class BonusOn Leave: Summon an Automaton Drone token. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: On Enter: summon an Automaton Drone token. [Class Bonus] On Leave: summon an Automaton Drone token. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Rapid call to action with automated directives.

name: Cosmic Astroscope
effect: Class BonusIf an opponent would glimpse, you may have that player glimpse 3 instead. : Glimpse 3. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] If an opponent would glimpse X, you may have that player glimpse 3 instead.
[Rest]: Glimpse 3. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: glimpse X -> glimpse

name: Archon Broadsword
effect: As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 2. Class BonusArchon Broadsword gets +1 for each token you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 2.
[Class Bonus] Archon Broadsword gets +1 power for each token you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Sentinel Fabricator
effect: 3, : Summon an Automaton Drone token with a buff counter on it.
effect_raw: (3), Rest: summon an Automaton Drone token with a buff counter on it.
flavor: Once an alchemist masters the composition and synthesis of an object, improvements follow.

name: Shadow's Twin
effect: Whenever Shadow's Twin becomes loaded, it gets +2 until end of turn. Class BonusWhenever an attack using this weapon triggers an On Hit ability, that ability is triggered an additional time.
effect_raw:
Whenever Shadow's Twin becomes loaded, it gets +2 power until end of turn.
[Class Bonus] Whenever an attack using this weapon triggers an On Hit ability, that ability is triggered an additional time.

name: Backstep
effect: Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.) Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)
Draw a card.
flavor: Any good demolitionist knows to take a few steps back before admiring their own handiwork.

editions.flavor: Some sights are best seen from afar.

editions.effect:
目標單位成為遠離。
抽一張牌。
editions.flavor: 那孩子甚至能用冰和霧作出夏天。

name: Evasive Maneuvers
effect: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn. If that unit is a Ranger, it becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)
effect_raw: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn. If that unit is a Ranger, it becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)
flavor: The key to survival is how fast you can duck and dodge when you are outmatched and outgunned.

editions.effect: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn. If that unit is a Ranger, it becomes distant.
editions.flavor: “Where there's smoke, there's Polkhawk!”

name: Foraging Servant
effect: On Enter: Gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.) Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw: On Enter: gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.) [Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Fortified Mana Shield
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 2 less to activate if its activation targets a unit with taunt. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) The next time target unit would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate if it targets a unit with taunt. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
The next time target unit would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'it targets -> its activation targets'

name: Heavy Swing
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Long-dormant power, fused into a single blow.

name: Imperial Recruit
effect: Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) Imperial Recruit gets +1 as long as it's fostered.
effect_raw:
Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) 
Imperial Recruit gets +1 power as long as it's fostered.

rule.description: Once this ally on the field is fostered, it can't be fostered again.
The Foster triggered ability will trigger even if that ally did not exist on the field for a full turn cycle.

editions.effect: 培育 只要 Imperial Recruit 被培育時，他獲得 +1。
editions.flavor: 「教祖大人呢？」「出門購物了。」       「獨自一人！？」

name: Imperial Rifleman
effect: Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2.) Class BonusOn Enter: Imperial Rifleman becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
Ranged 2 (As long as this unit is distant, its attacks get +2 power.)
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Imperial Rifleman becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Imperial Sentry
effect: Class BonusIntercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Level 2+ Imperial Sentry gets +1.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) 
[Level 2+] Imperial Sentry gets +1 life.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: Security -> Sentry

name: Martial Guard
effect: The next time target unit would be dealt damage this turn, prevent 2 of that damage. Class BonusLevel 2+ Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
The next time target unit would be dealt damage this turn, prevent 2 of that damage.
[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Materialize Munitions
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck. (You still pay its costs.)
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck. (You still pay its costs.)

name: Novice Mechanist
effect: Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) On Foster: Summon an Automaton Drone token.
effect_raw: Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) On Foster: summon an Automaton Drone token.

rule.description: Once this ally on the field is fostered, it can't be fostered again.
The Foster triggered ability will trigger even if that ally did not exist on the field for a full turn cycle.

name: Stalwart Shieldmate
effect: Taunt (While awake, this ally must be targeted before other units you control during your opponents' attack declarations if able.) Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Taunt (While awake, this ally must be targeted before other units you control during your oppent's attack declarations if able.)
Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Take Point
effect: Your champion gains taunt until the beginning of your next turn. (While awake, this unit must be targeted before other units you control during your opponents' attack declarations if able.) Class BonusFloating Memory
effect_raw:
Your champion gains taunt until the beginning of your next turn. (While awake, this unit must be targeted before other units you control during your opponents' attack declarations if able.)
[Class Bonus] Floating Memory

name: Incendiary Shot
effect: : Load Incendiary Shot into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.) Class BonusOn Hit: Deal 2 damage to the hit unit.
effect_raw:
REST: Load Incendiary Shot into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)
[Class Bonus] On Hit: Deal 2 damage to the hit unit. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

rule.description: While loaded into an object, if that object leaves the field, this bullet would be sent to the graveyard (or banishment if it's a regalia).

editions.effect: : Load Incendiary Shot into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. Class BonusOn Hit: Deal 2 damage to the hit unit.
editions.flavor: “The afterburn is just to be sure.”

name: Essence of Blizzards
effect: Brew — One Adjuvant, One Catalyst (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.) Sacrifice Essence of Blizzards: Deal 1 damage to target unit. If that unit is rested, deal 1+LV damage to it instead. Until end of turn, allies enter the field rested.
effect_raw:
Brew — One Adjuvant, One Catalyst (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.)
Sacrifice Essence of Blizzards: Deal 1 damage to target unit. If that unit is rested, deal 1+LV damage to it instead. Until end of turn, allies enter the field rested.

rule.description: When paying the Brew cost, modifications to the card's reserve cost is ignored. Other additional costs such as 'as an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally', is not ignored.

name: Recruitment Officer
effect: Class BonusFoster On Foster: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal an ally card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Foster 
On Foster: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal an ally card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

rule.description: Once this ally on the field is fostered, it can't be fostered again.
The Foster triggered ability will trigger even if that ally did not exist on the field for a full turn cycle.

name: Cosmic Bolt
effect: Starcalling — 2 (As you're looking at this card while glimpsing, you may activate it by paying this cost. If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.) Deal 4 damage to target unit plus an additional 2 for each card named Cosmic Bolt in your graveyard and banishment.
effect_raw:
Starcalling — 2 (As you're looking at this card while glimpsing, you may activate it by paying this cost. If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
Deal 4 damage to target unit plus an additional 2 for each card named Cosmic Bolt in your graveyard and banishment.

rule.description: If you starcall a card, that card is put onto the stack during the glimpse effect. It does not start resolving until after the current effect finishes resolving. For example, Scry the Skies has you glimpse 4, you starcall a card, you finish resolving Scry the Skies by drawing a card into your memory, then the effects stack can start resolving more cards.

name: Spirit Blade: Ascension
effect:
As an additional cost to activate this card, return a Sword regalia you own to your material deck.
Choose a Sword regalia card from your material deck or banishment and put it onto the field.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, return a Sword regalia you own to your material deck.
Choose a Sword regalia card from your material deck or banishment and put it onto the field.
flavor: With the spirits' aid, even a worn sword may be transfigured into a divine relic.

name: Frostbind
effect: Negate target card activation unless its controller pays 2. Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.
effect_raw: Negate target card activation unless its controller pays 2. Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.

rule.description: If Frostbind negates an attack card, the combat phase never gets to begin. This means that On Attack effects will not trigger. The attacker remains rested if resting that unit was an additional cost of that attack card.
The (2) in Frostbind's negate condition is a reserve cost, and can be paid by resting objects with reservable.

flavor: "O'Lumina who shelters us, bind those who seek us harm in frost. Grant us peace under your blessing."

name: Veiling Breeze
effect: Reveal any amount of wind element cards from your memory. Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to your champion, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards revealed this way.
effect_raw: Reveal any amount of wind element cards from your memory. Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to your champion, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards revealed this way.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'whenever damage would be dealt to your champion' -> 'if damage would be dealt to your champion'
Veiling Breeze counts the amount of wind cards revealed during resolution. It does not care about the amount of wind cards in your memory after it has resolved.

name: Lurking Assailant
effect: Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake. Level 1+Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.
effect_raw:
Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake.
[Level 1+] Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.

rule.description: Lurking Assailant's [Level 1+] ability allows it to retaliate against attackers even if that attacker isn't attacking Lurking Assailant. For example, if the opponent is attacking your champion with an ally, Lurking Assailant can retaliate. During that damage step, your champion will take damage from the attacking ally, and Lurking Assailant will deal damage to that attacking ally.

flavor: Some assassins prove their skill with a dagger, others prove it with a glib tongue and twisted schemes.

editions.effect: 只要 Lurking Assailant 為備戰狀態，他便具有潛行。 Level 1+當 Lurking Assailant 並未進行防禦時，他可以對攻擊者進行反擊。
editions.flavor: 這座城市正需要你這樣的審問官。

name: Orb of Hubris
effect: Banish Orb of Hubris: Draw up to three cards, then shuffle that amount of cards from your hand into your deck.
effect_raw: Banish Orb of Hubris: Draw up to three cards, then shuffle that amount of cards from your hand into your deck.
flavor: Granted to many imperial alchemists upon induction, this relic symbolizes the relentless pursuit of the truth for the ascension of mankind.

name: Capricious Lynx
effect: Pride 4 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 4 or higher.) Class BonusOn Enter: Capricious Lynx loses all abilities until end of turn.
effect_raw:
Pride 4 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 4 or higher.)
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Capricious Lynx loses all abilities until end of turn.
flavor: Quick to action, quicker to defiance.

name: Peaceful Reunion
effect:
Activate this card only if you have not declared an attack this turn.
Until the beginning of your next turn, you and target player can't declare attacks. Banish Peaceful Reunion.
effect_raw:
Activate this card only if you have not declared an attack this turn.
Until the beginning of your next turn, you and target player can't declare attacks. Banish Peaceful Reunion.

name: Empowering Prayer
effect: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn. Then if your champion's level is equal to the amount of cards in your memory, draw a card.
effect_raw: Your champion gets +2 level until end of turn. Then if your champion's level is equal to the amount of cards in your memory, draw a card.
flavor: The diligent pursuit of horticulture is often rewarded when the environmental conditions are just right.

name: Swooping Talons
effect: Choose one — • Deal 2 damage to target ally. • Level 2+ Destroy target item with memory cost 0 or reserve cost 4 or less. (Choose this option only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)
effect_raw:
Choose one —
• Deal 2 damage to target ally.
• [Level 2+] Destroy target item with memory cost 0 or reserve cost 4 or less. (Choose this option only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)

name: Scry the Skies
effect: Glimpse LV. Draw a card into your memory. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
effect_raw: Glimpse LV. Draw a card into your memory. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
flavor: The skies hold secrets only privy to the few versed in its signs.

name: Beseech the Winds
effect: Materialize a card from your material deck. (You still pay for its costs.)
effect_raw: Materialize a card from your material deck. (You still pay for its costs.)

rule.description: You may choose to fail to find a card from your material deck to materialize.

flavor: Camelot's splendor arises from the blessing of the winds.

name: Chilling Touch
effect: Banish a card at random from target opponent's memory. Return that card to their memory at the beginning of their next end phase. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Banish a card at random from target opponent's memory. Return that card to their memory at the beginning of their next end phase.
Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Into the Fray
effect: Up to one target ally you control gets +1 until end of turn for each other ally you control. Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Up to one target ally you control gets +1 power until end of turn for each other ally you control.
[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Fireworks Display
effect: Deal 1 damage to all units target player controls. Until end of turn, if a unit that player controls would die, banish it instead.
effect_raw: Deal 1 damage to all units target player controls. Until end of turn, if a unit that player controls would die, banish it instead.
flavor: An explosion is perfect for both friends and enemies. The only difference is just the distance.

name: Key Slime Pudding
effect: Banish Key Slime Pudding: Until end of turn, Slime allies that enter the field under your control enter with an additional buff counter on them.
flavor: A tasty snack enjoyed by slime but also by those adventurous enough to try it.

name: Assassin's Mantle
effect: If your champion would take damage, you may banish Assassin's Mantle. If you do, prevent 1 of that damage. Put a preparation counter on your champion if damage was prevented this way.
flavor: A good assassin is never seen without a means to veil their presence, but a masterful assassin is never seen.

name: Vaporjet Shieldbearer
effect: Steadfast (This ally can retaliate while rested and doesn't rest to do so.) Class BonusOn Hit: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card into your graveyard.
effect_raw:
Steadfast (This ally can retaliate while rested and doesn't rest to do so.)
[Class Bonus] On Hit: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card into your graveyard.
flavor: Automated portside insurance for pirates.

name: Priscilla, Lost Spirit
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: "A lack of color does not make for a lack of class."

name: Sable Remnant
effect: Class BonusSable Remnant gets +1. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Windmill Engineer
effect: Imbue 2 (You may reserve all cards revealed as you activate this card. If at least two of them are wind element, this card becomes imbued.) On Enter: If Windmill Engineer is imbued, draw a card into your memory.

rule.description: You reserve the cards face up. You do not place them face down and then 'reveal' them.

circulationTemplates.name: MRC U Foil (Powercell B, Atmos Shield, Ominous Shadow)

name: Lightweaver's Assault
effect: Reveal all cards in your memory. Choose any amount of units and deal damage equal to the amount of cards revealed split among them. Class BonusElement BonusWhenever you reveal Lightweaver's Assault from your memory, choose a unit and deal 2 damage to it.
effect_raw:
Reveal all cards in your memory. Choose any amount of units and deal damage equal to the amount of cards revealed split among them.
[Class Bonus] [Element Bonus] Whenever you reveal Lightweaver's Assault from your memory, choose a unit and deal 2 damage to it.

name: Exorcise Curses
effect: Choose up to two Curse cards from a champion's lineage and discard them. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Choose up to two Curse cards from a champion's lineage and discard them.
Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Cell Assembler
effect: On Enter: You may pay 2. If you do, summon a Powercell token rested.
flavor:
“Krustal’s freeze got you locked in your castle? With the latest line of assemblers, you’ll never go cold!”
— Gearstride Automatics Advertisement

editions.flavor:
“Carefully handcrafted by our latest models!”
— Gearstride Automatics Advertisement

name: Reduce to Ash
effect: Destroy target item or weapon with memory cost 0 or reserve cost 4 or less.
flavor: Ashes to ashes. Dust to dust.

name: Hailstorm Guard
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 2 less to activate. The next time damage would be dealt to your champion this turn, prevent that damage. Put an amount of cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard equal to the amount of damage prevented this way.

circulationTemplates.name: MRC U Foil (Powercell B, Atmos Shield, Ominous Shadow)

name: Vyra, Spirit of Fire
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: "A bloom of flame to ignite the heart."

name: Spirit of Slime
effect: On Enter:Draw seven cards. Inherited Effect: Ignore the elemental requirements of basic element Slime cards you activate.
flavor: An aura of amiability radiates from the soul, but for some reason, it feels a bit sticky.

name: Silvie, Slime Sovereign
effect: Silvie Lineage On Enter: The next Slime ally card you activate this turn costs 2 less to activate and enters the field with two additional buff counters on it. Ignore the elemental requirements of advanced element Slime cards you activate.

name: Slime Nexus
effect: Banish Slime Nexus: The next Slime ally card you activate this turn costs 3 less to activate.
flavor: The heart of a slime that instills in it hopes and dreams. This gelatinous core is central to any healthy slime's biology.

name: Slime Totem
effect: Slime allies you control have vigor. (These units wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)
flavor: Though it is merely a replica, the loyalty of Slime King's subjects knows no bounds, and slimes travel from across the forest just to bask in its presence.

name: Verdant Scepter
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: You may banish a Slime ally you control. If you do, put an amount of refinement counters on Verdant Scepter equal to the banished ally's power plus 1. , Remove a refinement counter from Verdant Scepter: Put a buff counter on each of up to two Slime allies you control then draw a card.

name: Baby Gray Slime
effect: Intercept On Enter: You may reveal two Slime cards from your hand and/or memory. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: A common species of slime. Though they exhibit no biologically remarkable traits, other slimes seem to naturally be drawn to them.

name: Forest Cake
effect: On Enter: Draw a card. Class BonusWhenever an Animal or Beast ally enters the field under your control, you may sacrifice Forest Cake. If you do, put a buff counter on that ally.

name: Limitless Slime
effect: Class BonusLevel 1+Floating Memory Class BonusLevel 2+Limitless Slime gets +1 and +2 . Class BonusLevel 3+On Attack: Put a buff counter on Limitless Slime.

name: Baby Red Slime
effect: Class BonusOn Attack: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card into your memory. If the discarded card was a fire element card, Baby Red Slime gets +1 until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion’s class matches this card’s class.)

name: Slime Eruption
effect: You may banish any amount of fire element Slime ally cards and up to two non-fire element Slime ally cards from your graveyard. For each card banished this way, choose a unit and deal 1 damage to it. Class BonusFloating Memory

name: Baby Blue Slime
effect: Class BonusBaby Blue Slime gets +1 . (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) : Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to another target Slime ally you control this turn.

name: Gather Slimes
effect: Class BonusFast Activation Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Recover X where X is the amount of Slime ally cards revealed this way. Put a Slime ally card from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Baby Green Slime
effect: Class BonusFast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.) On Enter: Suppress target item or weapon. (To suppress an object, banish it and return it to the field under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end phase.)

name: Slime's Blessing
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate. Choose up to three units. Put a level counter on each chosen champion and a buff counter on each chosen Slime ally. (Champions get +1 level for each level counter on them.)

name: Slimeshield
effect: Class BonusLevel 2+This card costs 1 less to activate. Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn. If that unit is a Slime ally, put a buff counter on it.
flavor: A pod of slimes will always protect their kin.

name: Storm Slime
effect: Pride 3 On Enter: As a Spell, deal damage to target unit equal to the number of Slime cards in your banishment. Class BonusOn Death: You may banish two cards at random from your memory. If you do, draw two cards.

rule.description: 'As a spell' means the effect acts as if it was a Spell subtype, so it can't target units with Spellshroud.

name: Ethereal Slime
effect: Pride 3, stealth, True Sight Class BonusOn Enter: You may banish a Tamer card from your material deck. If you do, draw a card and put a buff counter on Ethereal Slime. Level 5+ Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to Ethereal Slime.

name: Lustrous Slime
effect: Pride 5, Taunt On Enter: Reveal any amount of Slime cards from your memory. For each card revealed this way, put a buff counter on Lustrous Slime. On Death: Recover X, where X is the amount of buff counters that were on Lustrous Slime.

name: Slime King
effect: As an additional cost to activate this card, banish three Slime ally cards each with different elements from your graveyard. Pride 4, Taunt Element BonusOn Leave: You may put any number of the Slime ally cards banished by Slime King onto the field under your control.

name: Verdant Slime
effect: Pride 5 Class BonusTaunt On Enter: Destroy up to one target regalia with memory cost 0. If you don't, put two buff counters on Verdant Slime.

name: Tristan, Shadowdancer
effect: Tristan Lineage On Enter: Summon two Ominous Shadow tokens and put a preparation counter on Tristan. Remove two preparation counters from Tristan: Change the target of an attack that targets Tristan to a phantasia ally you control.

name: Curved Dagger
effect: Class BonusAs long as your champion is attacking an ally, Curved Dagger gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] As long as your champion is attacking an ally, Curved Dagger gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Its curved edge is perfect for slicing through the flesh of both man and monster.

name: Gearstride Gloves
effect: On Enter: Put a preparation counter on your champion. Class BonusLevel 2+Banish Gearstride Gloves: The next Reaction card you activate this turn costs 1 less to activate.
flavor: A fusion of gears and gust in one's palm.

name: Dusksoul Stone
effect: As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish two ally cards from a single graveyard. Phantasias you control have spellshroud. (Objects with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.) Banish Dusksoul Stone: Banish up to two cards from a single graveyard.

name: Malignant Athame
effect: Class BonusOn Champion Hit: You may have that opponent swap the cards in their hand and memory. Then if there are four or more cards in their memory, deal 2 unpreventable damage to the hit champion.
flavor: Weapons can be used for more than just killing.

name: Shadeblood Coating
effect: Banish Shadeblood Coating: Up to three target units you control gain "On Hit: Put a preparation counter on your champion" until end of turn.
flavor: This ominous oil ravenously drinks in blood to sharpen the next strike.

name: Exploit Vulnerability
effect: Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.) Draw a card. Then if Exploit Vulnerability was prepared, choose an Assassin unit you control and it gains "On Ally Hit: Destroy the hit ally" until end of turn.

name: Incapacitate
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) Negate target action card activation.
flavor: It's not about who strikes first, it's about who wins.

name: Mastermind Scheme
effect: Class BonusEfficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.) Double the amount of preparation counters on your champion. Then if there are eight or more preparation counters on your champion, you gain agility 3 for this turn.

name: Slice and Dice
effect: Prepare 3 On Hit: If Slice and Dice was prepared, you may have the attacker declare an additional attack. If you do, create a copy of Slice and Dice in that attacker's intent except it isn't prepared and it gets +3.

rule.description: If you have the attacker declare an additional attack, the effect will end the current combat and start a new combat. Any effects that were pending resolution will be banished and a new combat will immediately begin.
The copy of Slice and Dice is added to the intent after declaration of the attack. This is not a trigger and cannot be responded to.
You may choose a new attack target for the additional attack.
The new attack does not require your champion to be awake since only playing attack cards has the additional cost of resting your champion.

name: Thieving Cut
effect: Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.) On Hit: If Thieving Cut was prepared, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.)
On Hit: If Thieving Cut was prepared, draw a card.
flavor: What's yours is mine.

name: Arrow Trap
effect: Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.) Return target attacking ally to its owner's hand. Class Bonus: If Arrow Trap was prepared, destroy that ally instead.
effect_raw:
Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.)
Return target attacking ally to its owner's hand. Class Bonus: If Arrow Trap was prepared, destroy that ally instead.

name: Betraying Blade
effect: On Attack: You may pay 2. If you do, put a preparation counter on your champion. Class BonusFloating Memory(While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Cloaked Executioner
effect: Class BonusFast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.) Ambush (This ally may retaliate against attackers while not defending.)

name: Sirocco Operative
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Draw a card into your memory. On Enter: If you control another Automaton ally, put a preparation counter on your champion.
flavor: Efficient and discreet, these automatons leave no more trace than a gentle gust of wind.

name: Stifling Trap
effect: Class BonusIf it's not your turn, you may remove two preparation counters from your champion to activate this card from your memory without paying its reserve cost. Deal 2 damage to target ally, then negate all on enter triggers from that ally.

name: Surveil the Winds
effect: Class BonusFast Activation(You may activate this card at fast speed.) Draw a card, then put a preparation counter on your champion.
flavor: The winds tell more than just which direction it blows.

name: Gloamspire Headhunter
effect: Stealth (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.) Class BonusOn Ally Hit: Destroy the hit ally unless its controller pays 3.

name: Grim Foreboding
effect: Tristan BonusSummon an Ominous Shadow token. Phantasia allies you control get +1 until end of turn. You gain agility 3 for this turn.
flavor: It is unwise to underestimate a clone, for a shadow is as powerful as its owner's will.

name: Haunting Demise
effect: Class BonusOn Champion Hit: Put Haunting Demise on the bottom of the hit champion's lineage. Inherited Effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 unpreventable damage to this object.

name: Shadow Resonance
effect: Recover 2, then draw a card. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.) Tristan BonusIf your champion has four or more preparation counters on them, summon an Ominous Shadow token.

name: Shadowstrike
effect: Prepare X. X can't be 0. Shadowstrike gets +X. Class BonusIf Shadowstrike was prepared, it has unblockable. (An attack with unblockable can't be intercepted and ignores taunt.)

name: Shifting Mirage
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate. Your champion gains stealth until end of turn unless an opponent pays 2. Tristan BonusSummon an Ominous Shadow token.

name: Careful Study
effect: Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.) Put five enlighten counters on your champion. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
effect_raw:
Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.)
Put five enlighten counters on your champion. (You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)

name: Flame-Rune Swordsman
effect: Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: A mage's prowess. A warrior's might.

editions.flavor: A phoenix's will. A dragon's claws.
"I-it's because of the fire, okay?!"

name: Shira, Lost Spirit
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

name: Reprogram
effect: Up to one target ally gets -1 until end of turn. If that ally is an Automaton, put two debuff counters on it instead. (Allies get -1 power and -1 life for each debuff counter on them.) Floating Memory

rule.description: If a debuff counter were to put a unit's life at or below 0, the unit will die
Placing debuff counters on a unit with buff counters will cause equal amounts of debuff and buff counters to be removed.

name: Tariff Ring
effect: Banish Tariff Ring: Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay 2for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.
effect_raw: Banish Tariff Ring: Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay 2for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.

rule.description: The (2) in Tariff Ring's attack condition is a reserve cost, and can be paid by resting objects with reservable.

flavor: If profits are to be made, bring enough to share.

editions.flavor: The Mandate of Heaven stops even steel.

name: Executioner's Spear
effect: (Weapon — Enters the field with two durability counters. Weapons allow your champion to perform an attack, and can be used along with an attack card.) Jin BonusOn Kill: Put a durability counter on Executioner's Spear. (Apply this effect only if your champion is Jin.)
effect_raw:
(Weapon — Enters the field with two durability counters. Weapons allow your champion to perform an attack, and can be used along with an attack card.)
[Jin Bonus] On Kill: Put a durability counter on Executioner's Spear. (Apply this effect only if your champion is Jin.)

rule.description: A durability counter is removed on the resolution of the damage step. Before the On Kill ability of Executioner's Spear resolves, the weapon is checked for destruction due to zero durability counters.

name: Fan of Seven Debts
effect: On Enter: Draw a card. Kongming BonusBanish Fan of Seven Debts: Change the direction of your Shifting Currents to a different direction of your choice.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Draw a card.
[Kongming Bonus] Banish Fan of Seven Debts: Change the direction of your Shifting Currents to a different direction of your choice.
flavor: Innocent wishes sway like a snow crane's feathers.

editions.flavor: Innocent wishes sway like a snow crane's feathers.

name: Blazing Throw
effect:
As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice a weapon.
Deal 4 damage to target unit.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice a weapon.
Deal 4 damage to target unit.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice a weapon you control.' -> 'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice a weapon.

flavor: Tossing away your weapon is either stupid or genius with little room in between.

name: Backup Charger
effect: 3, Banish Backup Charger: Summon a Powercell token rested. Draw a card into your memory.
flavor:
“Running out of energy too fast? In a pinch? Our prototype failsafe will guarantee you a fresh charge!”
— Gearstride Automatics Advert

name: Academy Attendant
effect: Class BonusMemory 4+Academy Attendant gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] [Memory 4+] Academy Attendant gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)
flavor: Capable of cataloging the Academy's vast research.

name: Fractal of Rain
effect: Imbue 2 At the beginning of your recollection phase, if fractal of rain is imbued, target player puts the top card of their deck into the graveyard. Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

rule.description: You reserve the cards face up. You do not place them face down and then 'reveal' them.

circulationTemplates.name: MRC U Foil (Powercell B, Atmos Shield, Ominous Shadow)

name: Heighten Spellcraft
effect: Empower 3. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +3 level.) Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Empower 3. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +3 level.)
[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Ardent Cloudstriker
effect: On Attack: If your Shifting Currents face West and Ardent Cloudstriker is attacking a champion, this attack gets +3 .
effect_raw: On Attack: If your Shifting Currents face West and Ardent Cloudstriker is attacking a champion, this attack gets +3 power.

editions.flavor: Trained in the sky above the clouds, these elite guards strike like thunder with unerring foresight.

name: Banner Knight
effect: Class BonusLevel 2+Other allies and weapons you control get +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Other allies and weapons you control get +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)
flavor: Standards raised behind capable leaders often instill courage in those that march astride.

editions.effect: Class BonusLevel 2+Other allies and weapons you control get +1.
editions.flavor: Their passion and fervor on the battlefield inspire fellow warriors to ascend in strength.

name: Bauble of Abundance
effect: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
effect_raw: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
flavor: Glittering trinkets, coins, and treasures. Plenty enough to be shared among friend and foe alike.

editions.flavor: The imperial treasury lies unclaimed. Both avaricious and ambitious covet the wealth hidden within.

name: Berserker Plate
effect: Class BonusYour champion gets +7 . (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 3 unpreventable damage to your champion then draw a card.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Your champion gets +7 life. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 3 unpreventable damage to your champion then draw a card.

name: Coriolis Ward
effect: Prevent the next 1+LV damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn. (LV refers to your champion's level.) If your Shifting Currents face West, draw a card into your memory.
effect_raw:
Prevent the next 1+LV damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn. (LV refers to your champion's level.)
If your Shifting Currents face West, draw a card into your memory.

name: Coronal of Rejuvenation
effect: As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish a preserved card from your material deck. On Enter: Banish any amount of Spell cards from your graveyard. : You may play a card banished by Coronal of Rejuvenation. Activate this ability only at slow speed.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish a preserved card from your material deck.
On Enter: Banish any amount of Spell cards from your graveyard.
[REST]: You may play a card banished by Coronal of Rejuvenation. Activate this ability only at slow speed.

rule.description: You may play the card was was banished for the materialization cost with the rest ability. This is also true for any floating memory or cards in memory used to pay for its materialization costs.

name: Devoted Bloomweaver
effect: Preserve (When this ally dies, put it into its owner's material deck preserved. As you materialize, you may instead return a preserved card to your hand.) Class BonusOn Enter: Empower 2.
effect_raw:
Preserve (When this ally dies, put it into its owner's material deck preserved. As you materialize, you may instead return a preserved card to your hand.)
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Empower 2.
flavor: An enigma that defies, and yet, sharpens reality.

editions.flavor: "Willows make shade but spring gives light."

name: Eminent Commander
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 3 less to activate as long as your champion has dealt 3 or more combat damage this turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] This card costs 3 less to activate as long as your champion has dealt 3 or more combat damage this turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

editions.flavor: "I go only where I am most needed."

name: Enrage
effect: Damage 20+ This card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if there are twenty or more damage counters on your champion.) Deal 4 unpreventable damage to your champion. Then, their next attack this turn gets +1 for every four damage counters on them.
effect_raw:
[Damage 20+] This card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if there are twenty or more damage counters on your champion.)
Deal 4 unpreventable damage to your champion. Then, their next attack this turn gets +1 power for every four damage counters on them.

name: Entrancing Filigree
effect: On Enter: As a Spell, banish target non-champion object you don't control. (Spell abilities can't target objects with spellshroud.) On Leave: Return the banished object to the field under its owner's control rested.
effect_raw:
On Enter: As a Spell, banish target non-champion object you don't control. (Spell abilities can't target objects with spellshroud.)
On Leave: Return the banished object to the field under its owner's control rested.

name: Formidable Youxia
effect: Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.) As long as your Shifting Currents face East, Formidable Youxia gets +2 .
effect_raw:
Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.)
As long as your Shifting Currents face East, Formidable Youxia gets +2 life.

name: Harmonious Mantra
effect: Recover 3. If your Shifting Currents face North, recover 3+LV instead. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)
effect_raw: Recover 3. If your Shifting Currents face North, recover 3+LV instead. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)
flavor: Some sights are best seen from afar.

editions.flavor: Healing flesh wounds is simple, but corruption can run deeper still.

name: Pierce the Heavens
effect: Jin BonusAs long as your champion has leveled up this turn, this attack gets +2 and has unblockable. (An attack with unblockable can't be intercepted and ignores taunt. Apply this effect only if your champion is Jin.)
effect_raw: [Jin Bonus] As long as your champion has leveled up this turn, this attack gets +2 power and has unblockable. (An attack with unblockable can't be intercepted and ignores taunt. Apply this effect only if your champion is Jin.)
flavor: Sometimes the best solution is straight forward.

editions.flavor: Do the impossible, see the invisible.

name: Reclaim
effect: Return target ally you control to its owner's hand. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Return target ally you control to its owner's hand.
Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: A summoning circle at the ready for a quick escape.

editions.effect: Return target ally you control to its owner's hand. Floating Memory
editions.flavor: Magical ingenuity turned into battlefield tactics.

name: Safeguard Amulet
effect: Banish Safeguard Amulet: If your champion would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.
effect_raw: Banish Safeguard Amulet: If your champion would take non-combat damage this turn, prevent 4 of that damage.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'Whenever your champion would take non-attack damage this turn' -> 'If your champion would take non-attack damage this turn'

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: non-attack damage' -> 'non-combat damage'

flavor: Hopefully enough to block a fatal spell.

name: Safeguard Paladin
effect: Class BonusIf non-combat damage would be dealt to Safeguard Paladin, prevent 2 of that damage. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] If non-combat damage would be dealt to Safeguard Paladin, prevent 2 of that damage. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: The emperor's gates are well-watched with these soldiers' dutiful eyes and faithful hearts.

editions.flavor: Blessed prayer deflects vile curses.

name: Savage Swing
effect: Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: War cannot be won alone.

editions.flavor: There are those who thrive in conflict.

name: Shard of Empowerment
effect: Banish Shard of Empowerment: Empower 2. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)
effect_raw: Banish Shard of Empowerment: Empower 2. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)
flavor: A fragment of a legendary crystal lost to time. Its power is rumored to be beyond mortal control.

editions.flavor: A fragment of a legendary crystal lost to time. Its power is rumored to be beyond mortal control.

name: Shifting Currents
effect: Kongming BonusAt the beginning of your end phase, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to a different direction of your choice. (The directions are North, South, East, and West.)
effect_raw: [Kongming Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to a different direction of your choice. (The directions are North, South, East, and West.)
flavor: "No matter the direction, I guide the flow of battle."

editions.flavor: "No matter the direction, I guide the flow of battle."

name: Shuang Ji of Sacrifice
effect: Class BonusFor every five damage counters on your champion, Shuang Ji of Sacrifice gets +1 . On Enter: You may have Shuang Ji of Sacrifice deal 5 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] For every five damage counters on your champion, Shuang Ji of Sacrifice gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
On Enter: You may have Shuang Ji of Sacrifice deal 5 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, draw a card.

name: Slate Whetstone
effect: Banish Slate Whetstone: Up to one target Polearm weapon you control gets +1 until end of turn. Draw a card.
effect_raw: Banish Slate Whetstone: Up to one target Polearm weapon you control gets +1 power until end of turn. Draw a card.
flavor: Once more ready for battle.

editions.flavor: Once more ready for battle.

name: Spirited Neophyte
effect: On Attack: If your Shifting Currents face North, empower 2. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)
effect_raw: On Attack: If your Shifting Currents face North, empower 2. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)

editions.flavor: Dissatisfied with dynastic rule, many of Sanguo's youth joined the cause under Zhang Jiao.

name: Steel Halberd
effect: Class BonusSteel Halberd gets +1 . (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Steel Halberd gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Forged by imperial weaponsmiths and tempered by countless battles.

editions.flavor: Forged by imperial weaponsmiths and tempered by countless battles.

name: Sweet Ambrosia
effect: Banish Sweet Ambrosia: Recover 3. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)
effect_raw: Banish Sweet Ambrosia: Recover 3. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)
flavor: On the night of the Yuetai Festival, under the moon's guiding light, a drop is gifted to the greatest archer.

editions.flavor: On the night of the Yuetai Festival, under the moon's guiding light, a drop is gifted to the greatest archer.

name: Taiji of Crystal Strategems
effect: Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing South to East while Taiji of Crystal Strategems is awake, you may rest it. When you do, as a Spell, deal 3 damage to target champion you don't control. Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
As a Spell, whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing South to East while Taiji of Crystal Strategems is awake, you may rest it. If you do, deal 3 damage to target champion you don't control.
Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: Xia Hou Dun's masterful control of the flow of battle lets her string lethal strikes into crafted opportunities.

name: Brissa, Spirit of Wind
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

name: Cone of Frost
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate. Level 1+ Deal 2 damage to up to one target unit. Level 3+ Deal 2 damage to up to one target unit. Level 5+ Deal 2 damage to up to one target unit.

rule.description: Each instance of damage can target multiple units

name: Staggering Strike
effect: True Sight (This attack can target units with stealth.) On Champion Hit: Remove three preparation counters from the hit champion.
effect_raw:
True Sight (This attack can target units with stealth.)

On Champion Hit: Remove three preparation counters from the hit champion.

editions.flavor: Concussive force swung with terrifying ferocity.

name: Lost in Thought
effect: You may banish up to X cards with floating memory from your graveyard. Draw a card for each card banished this way. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

rule.description: The value of X can be any number regardless of number of cards with floating memory you select to banish during resolution.

name: Peer into Mana
effect: Put 2+LV enlighten counters on your champion. (LV refers to your champion's level. You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
effect_raw: Put 2+LV enlighten counters on your champion. (LV refers to your champion's level. You may remove three enlighten counters from your champion to draw a card.)
flavor: Few have such innate talent to probe pure mana. Fewer still can exquisitely mold it.

effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

name: Morrigan, Lost Spirit
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: "Abandon yourself to my serenity."

name: Nascent Blast
effect: Deal 3 damage to target unit. If Nascent Blast is empowered, put it into your memory.
effect_raw: Deal 3 damage to target unit. If Nascent Blast is empowered, put it into your memory.

editions.flavor:
"With the Luopan, the Golden Sashes shall lead a new future for Sanguo and carve our own path."
– Zhang Jiao, Savior of Peace
